# polar_organization (Data Source)

Fetches the Polar organization associated with the configured access token. If `id` is omitted, the organization is auto-discovered.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The organization ID. If omitted, auto-discovers via the access token.

### Read-Only

- `avatar_url` (String) The organization avatar URL.
- `customer_email_settings` (Attributes) Controls which transactional emails are sent to customers. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--customer_email_settings))
- `email` (String) The organization contact email.
- `feature_settings` (Attributes) Feature flags for the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--feature_settings))
- `name` (String) The name of the organization.
- `notification_settings` (Attributes) Email notification preferences. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--notification_settings))
- `slug` (String) The organization slug.
- `socials` (Attributes List) List of social links for the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--socials))
- `subscription_settings` (Attributes) Subscription behavior settings. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--subscription_settings))
- `website` (String) The organization website URL.

<a id="nestedatt--customer_email_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `customer_email_settings`

Read-Only:

- `order_confirmation` (Boolean) Whether to send order confirmation emails.
- `subscription_cancellation` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription cancellation emails.
- `subscription_confirmation` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription confirmation emails.
- `subscription_cycled` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription renewal emails.
- `subscription_past_due` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription past-due emails.
- `subscription_revoked` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription revoked emails.
- `subscription_uncanceled` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription uncanceled emails.
- `subscription_updated` (Boolean) Whether to send subscription updated emails.


<a id="nestedatt--feature_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `feature_settings`

Read-Only:

- `issue_funding_enabled` (Boolean) Whether issue funding is enabled.
- `revops_enabled` (Boolean) Whether RevOps features are enabled.
- `seat_based_pricing_enabled` (Boolean) Whether seat-based pricing is enabled.
- `wallets_enabled` (Boolean) Whether wallets are enabled.


<a id="nestedatt--notification_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `notification_settings`

Read-Only:

- `new_order` (Boolean) Whether to send notifications for new orders.
- `new_subscription` (Boolean) Whether to send notifications for new subscriptions.


<a id="nestedatt--socials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `socials`

Read-Only:

- `platform` (String) The social platform.
- `url` (String) The URL for the social link.


<a id="nestedatt--subscription_settings"></a>
### Nested Schema for `subscription_settings`

Read-Only:

- `allow_customer_updates` (Boolean) Whether customers can self-manage their subscriptions.
- `allow_multiple_subscriptions` (Boolean) Whether customers can hold multiple active subscriptions.
- `benefit_revocation_grace_period` (Number) Number of days before benefits are revoked after subscription cancellation.
- `prevent_trial_abuse` (Boolean) Whether to prevent trial abuse by restricting repeat trials.
- `proration_behavior` (String) How mid-cycle subscription changes are billed.
